courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.lesson:
Introduction to HTML and CSS

Learn the basics of web development with HTML and CSS. Understand how to structure content and style it to create visually appealing web pages.

Key Concepts CoveredHTML: Learn to create the structure of a web page using HTML tags.CSS: Explore the basics of styling and layout using CSS.

Building Your First Website

Apply your knowledge by building a simple website from scratch. Practice creating different types of HTML elements and styling them with CSS.

Get ready to embark on your journey into web development!

qcm.question: What is the main purpose of CSS?

courses.title: JavaScript Programming Basics
courses.lesson:
Introduction to JavaScript

Delve into the fundamentals of JavaScript programming. Learn about variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

Key Topics CoveredVariables and Data Types: Understand how to store and manipulate data in JavaScript.Control Structures: Learn about if statements, loops, and other control flow mechanisms.Functions: Explore the concept of functions and their role in JavaScript.

Hands-On Coding Exercises

Practice your JavaScript skills with coding exercises. Build small programs to reinforce your understanding of the language.

Get ready to write dynamic and interactive web applications!

qcm.question: What does the 'if' statement do in JavaScript?

options.answer: Controls the flow of execution based on a condition

courses.title: Responsive Web Design with Bootstrap
courses.lesson:
Introduction to Bootstrap

Discover the power of Bootstrap for creating responsive and visually appealing web designs. Learn about the Bootstrap grid system, components, and utilities.

Key Features of BootstrapGrid System: Understand how to create responsive layouts with the Bootstrap grid.Components: Explore pre-built components like navigation bars, cards, and forms.Utilities: Use Bootstrap utilities to style and align elements quickly.

Building a Responsive Website

Apply Bootstrap to design a responsive website. Learn how to adapt your site's layout to different screen sizes and devices.

Elevate your web design skills with Bootstrap!

qcm.question: What is the main purpose of the Bootstrap grid system?

courses.title: Introduction to Backend Development with Node.js
courses.lesson:
Getting Started with Node.js

Explore the basics of backend development using Node.js. Learn about server-side JavaScript, npm packages, and building APIs.

Key Concepts in Backend DevelopmentNode.js Fundamentals: Understand the basics of Node.js and its role in backend development.npm Packages: Explore the Node Package Manager (npm) and how to use third-party packages.Building APIs: Learn how to create a simple API using Node.js.

Hands-On Project: Todo List API

Build a Todo List API using Node.js. Implement CRUD operations and gain practical experience in backend development.

Take your first steps into building robust backend systems!
